references.paper_title: A regularized conditional GAN for posterior sampling in inverse problems
references.reason: This paper introduces the rcGAN, a foundational model for the pcaGAN proposed in this work, providing the base framework for posterior sampling with a cGAN

references.paper_title: High perceptual quality image denoising with a posterior sampling CGAN
references.reason: This paper presents the pscGAN, another crucial model for understanding the evolution of GANs applied to posterior sampling that is improved upon by pcaGAN

references.paper_title: Uncertainty quantification via neural posterior principal components
references.reason: This paper introduces NPPC, an alternative approach for uncertainty quantification that the proposed approach outperforms, providing a benchmark for comparison
This paper introduces a basic framework for deep Bayesian inversion with cGANs, providing a fundamental model that is later improved and built upon

references.paper_title: Robust compressed sensing MRI with deep generative priors
references.reason: This paper introduces a Langevin diffusion model applied to MRI reconstruction, representing a different approach than cGANs used for comparison with the proposed model
